mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Thomas F. Snead, He Reached 21 Years of age on 12.27.1899
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Thomas F. Snead, He Reached 21 Years of age on 12.27.1899 W.C. Lester, Guardian, Administrator after Thomas Snead Died 05.15.1900 Recorded in Ledger Book 5, page 106, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
